original_text: In the first month of each year, you must eat bread without yeast in it. Do this from the evening of the 14th day until the evening of the 21st day.
korean_text: 첫째 달 그 달 열나흗날 저녁부터 이십일일 저녁까지 너희는 무교병을 먹을 것이요

sentences.original_text: In the first month of each year
you must eat bread without yeast in it
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 누룩 없는 빵을 먹어야 한다

sentences.original_text: Do this from the evening of the 14th day
until the evening of the 21st day
